mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT r.num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, r.regdate FROM board_reserve_comment r INNER JOIN shelter s ON writer=id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, r.num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_reserve_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT ref_group, count(ref_group) AS cnt FROM board_reserve_comment GROUP BY ref_group
